); } // Componente auxiliare const StatsCard = ({ title, value, icon, trend, trendColor }) => (
{icon}
{trend !== "0" && (trend.startsWith('+') ? '↑' : '↓')} {trend}

{title}

{value}

 ); const ActivityItem = ({ title, timestamp, user }) => (

{title}

{timestamp} • {user}
); const ExpiringDocItem = ({ title, entity, expiryDate, type }) => (

{title}

{entity}

{expiryDate}
); const DriverStatusCard = ({ name, vehicle, status }) => (

{name}

{vehicle}

{status === 'active' ? 'Activ' : 'În Concediu'}
);
